actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such member as a prisoner of war.

summary.text: Provides, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, an additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such member as a prisoner of war.

titles.title: A bill to provide, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such member as a prisoner of war.
